Windlord::

"Well" said Windlord "I met Aerotaur some months ago and we fight 
together in several battles, most of them here in our base. With he, 
Nightlight and I  formed a faction named Chivtrons, some bots join 
us... but we have lost friends. Before I met Aerotaur I can't said a 
lot, I just can said that he's the guardian of the little Trinity. 
Tell me, please, Do you think that Aerotaur is in danger due his 
leader? could he try to kill Aerotaur?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Terrataur::
>        "Yes.  We chased him here after the incident and his ship 
was 
> destroyed in space.  We think a stasis pod containing his body 
landed on the 
> planet somewhere.  We haven't started tracking him yet though.  Can 
you, 
> perhaps, tell me what has happened to Aerotaur since he landed 
here?"
